channel.title: Train the Models on IBM CloudPak for Watson AIOps - Training
channel.description: Recent content in Train the Models on IBM CloudPak for Watson AIOps - Training

item.title: Train the Models
item.description: Train the Models In this chapter you will define and train AI Models for Log Anomaly Detectiom Metric Anomaly Detection Event Grouping Similar Incidents Change Risk

item.title: Log Anomalies
item.description: Define Log Anomalies Training In the AIManager “Hamburger” Menu select Operate/AI Model Management Under Log anomaly detection - natural language, click on Set up training Click Next Under Select data check Custom Select Start date as March, 3rd 2022 Select End date as March, 4rd 2022 Click Next Click Next Click Next Under Deployment type check On completion Click Done Run Log Anomalies Training Click on the three dots in the upper right corner of the Log anomaly detection - natural language card

item.title: Metric Anomalies
item.description: Define Metric Anomalies Training In the AIManager “Hamburger” Menu select Operate/AI Model Management Under Metric anomaly detection, click on Set up training Click Next Click Next Click Done Run Metric Anomalies Training Click on the three dots in the upper right corner of the Metric anomaly detection card Select Start Training Status should say In progress And eventually say Deployed

item.title: Similar Incidents
item.description: Define Similar Incidents Training In the AIManager “Hamburger” Menu select Operate/AI Model Management Under Similar Incidents, click on Set up training Click Next Click Next Click Done Run Similar Incidents Training Click on the three dots in the upper right corner of the Similar Incidents card Select Start Training Status should say In progress And eventually say Deployed

item.title: Change Risk
item.description: Define Change Risk Training In the AIManager “Hamburger” Menu select Operate/AI Model Management Under Change Risk, click on Set up training Click Next Click Next Under Deployment type check On completion Click Done Run Change Risk Training Click on the three dots in the upper right corner of the Change Risk card Select Start Training Status should say In progress And eventually say Deployed

item.title: Temporal Grouping
item.description: Define Temporal Grouping Training In the AIManager “Hamburger” Menu select Operate/AI Model Management Under Temporal Grouping, click on Set up training Click Next Click Next Click Done Run Temporal Grouping Training Click on the three dots in the upper right corner of the Temporal Grouping card Select Start Training Status should say In progress And eventually say Deployed

item.title: Check Training
item.description: Check Training Status Check your Training Cards. All should be green and say Deployed You are now done with the chapter on Training the AIManager Models You have successfully completed installing and configuring AIManager Please continue to the next chapter to learn how to test your installation .
